entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers over northern sections this evening and after midnight. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers over northern sections. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
